availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: T. M Combs (Grant County, Kentucky, deputy sheriff and clerk)

body.p: Grant County, Kentucky, deputy sheriff and clerk. Kentucky native. Son of John D. Combs. Married to Mary L. Combs. Deputy sheriff in Grant County in 1861. Clerk in Grant County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Grant County, KY, June and July 1863, p. 84, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grant, p. 10A.
KYR-0001-020-1534.
